bibl.title: Two Sides of a Coin: Aurelian, Vaballathus, and Eastern Frontiers in the Early 270s.
bibl.note: Examine notamment les frappes monétaires de l'atelier d'Alexandrie.

bibl.title: Shifting Frontiers in Late Antiquity. [Papers of the First Interdisciplinary Conference on Late Antiquity, The University of Kansas, March, 1995]

bibl.seg: LONG Jacqueline, Two Sides of a Coin: Aurelian, Vaballathus, and Eastern Frontiers in the Early 270s.

Ralph W. MATHISEN and Hagith S. SIVAN (Edd.), Shifting Frontiers in Late Antiquity. [Papers of the First Interdisciplinary Conference on Late Antiquity, The University of Kansas, March, 1995] (Aldershot, 1995) pp. 59-71, 6 figg.
Examine notamment les frappes monétaires de l'atelier d'Alexandrie.
